channel.title: Damagecounter problem
channel.description:
i noticed a confusing problem, for example, my oppenent has 99 hp, i hit 2 on him, the clientsided red hp bar shows 97 hp, but the damage counter( round thing on other player) shows 0.
Can anyone help me fix it?
